post:
We’re a bit late with our Black Friday deals but hopefully you haven’t spent all your money just yet. :)

**4GB OpenVZ**  

* 4GB RAM  
* 2x vCPU  
* 100GB HDD  
* 1TB Bandwidth  
* 1 IPv4  
* $5/m - **[Order Here](https://tnahosting.net/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=48)**

 

**Dual Intel Xeon L5420 Dedicated Server**
 
* 2x L5420 – 8 cores @ 2.5GHz  
* 24GB DDR2 RAM  
* 2x 250GB HDD  
* 10TB @ 100Mbps  
* Dedicated IPMI/KVM  
* /29 IPv4 (4 usable + 1 for IPMI)  
* $39.99/m – **[Order Here](https://tnahosting.net/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=49)**
 


Looking Glass - http://lg.chi.tnahosting.net/

Virtual servers are setup instantly after payment, dedicated servers will be setup in 1-3 days. All servers in this offer will be located at our _Chicago_ location, in Naperville, IL. AUP TL;DR: If it’s legal in the US and you’re not bothering your neighbors, we’re good! Feel free to hop on live chat or open a ticket if you have any questions.
